channel.title: Connect to servers
channel.description:
Hi there, I'm pretty new to this whole private server thing. I try to connect to the servers of various people, but I always get the "error connecting to server message" I know that it could be their server, but I've tried 10-15 different servers. Like I tried connecting to one with the server ip onlythebest.zapto.org but I never manage to connect. Also, I'm using a router if that makes a difference.
Thanks a lot.
Aksha
